title: Addison Rae’s dad CAUGHT CHEATING
description:
Manny and Laura are back again for another episode of Fool Coverage and this week is rapid fire! They cover Addison Rae's dad cheating allegations, Doja Cat calling out Noah Shnapp, Becky G's makeup brand: Tresluce beauty getting plagiarism allegations, and more!
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733
More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.
Thanks to our sponsors:

Our listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/foolcoverage.

Join eHarmony now!

For listeners of the show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to dipseastories.com/FOOL.
